transArray.content: The breakfast was delicious. The front desk girl's service was very good, enthusiastic, and thoughtful. She solved some problems for the guests. The room was clean and sanitary. It was a novel and smart Xiaodu. I was very satisfied.
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
